description: This table contains information about support staff.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SUPPORT_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The provider ID for the support staff.

columns.name: SUPPORT_STAFF_PHASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This category ID for the support staff phase.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Pre-op


Holding


Intra-op


Recovery


Phase II

columns.name: SUPPORT_STAFF_START_TM
columns.description: This column stores the start time for the support staff.

columns.name: SUPPORT_STAFF_END_TM
columns.description: This column stores the end time for the support staff.

columns.name: SUPPORT_STAFF_COMMENTS_FT
columns.description: This column stores free-text information about the support staff.
